snippet.title: Anx Defense | Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Anx Defense is a mind-bending twist on the classic tower defense genre. Protect yourself with a single tower and deflect your projectiles using mirrors. 
Strategy is key to manage your resources and empower your shots!

Anx Defense is the first title of Nocteon Games, crafted with love by our 2-members team!

Wishlist the game on Steam !
bit.ly/anxdefense
